ygData.subject: RE: Lyssa's Voracious Concord
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m a human bard, which means at night I m nearsighted.  I carry a greater lightstone at all times, but there are situations when I wished I could have had
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> What's the incentive to sing it at all?

I'm a human bard, which means at night I'm nearsighted. I carry a greater
lightstone at all times, but there are situations when I wished I could
have had better vision. One was when an invisible ranger was waiting to
steal a spawn from a group I was in the graveyard of Mistmoore with.<gr>

Also, I have struggled returning to my corpse god knows how many times.
I've literally gotten lost trying to zone from North Qeynos to South
Qeynos in the tunnel without a light source. You don't realize how dark
those passages are until you're in one with no infravision, no
ultravision, no lightstone, and no one else around.

Athren Notechaser, sightsharpened and loving it
